about_the_game:
In this game, the user must pick up objects that will help him and solve the puzzles and finish the tasks. With each finished task the user will go to the next level. The user must look for objects that will help him solve the puzzles.
With each chapter finished the next chapter will be released. The player must look for objects in the scene that can help in solving the puzzle and pick them up, when the puzzle is finished it will open the door that will allow you to go to the next chapter. Some chapters do not require solving puzzles, but performing a sequence of tasks to complete. Other chapters require the player's skill in moving the character using the controller or keyboard keys, or running and dodging obstacles. In chapters where small skulls appear, it means that the character is at risk of dying, in these chapters you need to be more careful. When all chapters are finished the player wins.
